achievements.name: Heal Up
achievements.description: Find the first Medical Kiosk and heal yourself

achievements.name: Tourist
achievements.description: Access and download the city map to your VISR

achievements.name: Dark Times
achievements.description: Kill 5 enemies whole using VISR mode

achievements.name: Boom, Headshot
achievements.description: Get 10 automag headshot kills in any level.

achievements.name: Stunning!
achievements.description: Stun a vehicle with an overcharged plasma pistol and quickly kill the driver.

achievements.name: Ewww, Sticky
achievements.description: Get 5 sticky grenade kills in any level.

achievements.name: My Clothes!
achievements.description: Plasma Pistol Overcharge and quickly kill 10 Brutes.

achievements.name: Pink and Deadly
achievements.description: Get 10 Needler supercombine kills on any covenant.

achievements.name: Trading Down
achievements.description: Trade weapons with a fellow character.

achievements.name: Headcase
achievements.description: Finish any level with at least one Skull activated.

achievements.name: Good Samaritan
achievements.description: Killing things that are new and different is bad, alone or with another ODST.

achievements.name: Naughty Naughty
achievements.description: Killing things that are new and different is good, alone or with another ODST.

achievements.name: Tayari Plaza
achievements.description: Complete Tayari Plaza on Normal, Heroic, or Legendary to unlock a new Firefight character.

achievements.name: Uplift Reserve
achievements.description: Complete Uplift Reserve on Normal, Heroic, or Legendary to unlock a new Firefight character.

achievements.name: Wraith Killer
achievements.description: Kill all Wraiths in Uplift Reserve.

achievements.name: Kizingo Boulevard
achievements.description: Complete Kizingo Blvd. on Normal, Heroic, or Legendary to unlock a new Firefight character.

achievements.name: Both Tubes
achievements.description: Get 10 Rocket kills on Kizingo Boulevard.

achievements.name: ONI Alpha Site
achievements.description: Complete ONI Alpha Site on Normal, Heroic, or Legendary to unlock a new Firefight mission.

achievements.name: Laser Blaster
achievements.description: Get 10 Spartan Laser kills on ONI Alpha Site.

achievements.name: NMPD HQ
achievements.description: Complete NMPD HQ on Normal, Heroic, or Legendary to unlock a new Firefight character.

achievements.name: Dome Inspector
achievements.description: Get 15 headshot kills on NMPD HQ.

achievements.name: Kikowani Station
achievements.description: Complete Kikowani Station on Normal, Heroic, or Legendary.

achievements.name: Data Hive
achievements.description: Complete Data Hive on Normal, Heroic, or Legendary to unlock a new Firefight mission.

achievements.name: I Like Fire
achievements.description: Kill 10 enemies with the Flamethrower on Data Hive.

achievements.name: Coastal Highway
achievements.description: Complete Coastal Highway on Normal, Heroic, or Legendary to unlock a new Firefight mission.

achievements.name: Campaign Complete: Normal
achievements.description: Complete the Campaign on Normal difficulty.

achievements.name: Campaign Complete: Heroic
achievements.description: Complete the Campaign on Heroic difficulty.

achievements.name: Campaign Complete: Legendary
achievements.description: Complete the Campaign on Legendary to unlock a new Firefight character.

achievements.name: Junior Detective
achievements.description: Find the first clue unraveling the mystery.

achievements.name: Gumshoe
achievements.description: Find the 3rd clue unraveling the mystery, alone or with another ODST.

achievements.name: Super Sleuth
achievements.description: Find the final clue unraveling the mystery, alone or with another ODST.

achievements.name: Listener
achievements.description: Find the first Audio Log.

achievements.name: Tuned In
achievements.description: Find 3 Audio Logs, alone or with another ODST.

achievements.name: All Ears
achievements.description: Find 15 Audio Logs, alone or with another ODST.

achievements.name: Audiophile
achievements.description: Find all Audio Logs, alone or with another ODST.

achievements.name: Be Like Marty
achievements.description: In Firefight, finish a full round without killing a single enemy.

achievements.name: Firefight: Crater
achievements.description: Score over 200,000 points in Firefight on Crater.

achievements.name: Firefight: Lost Platoon
achievements.description: Score over 200,000 points in Firefight on Lost Platoon.

achievements.name: Firefight: Rally Point
achievements.description: Score over 200,000 points in Firefight on Rally Point.

achievements.name: Firefight: Security Zone
achievements.description: Score over 200,000 points in Firefight on Security Zone.

achievements.name: Firefight: Alpha Site
achievements.description: Score over 200,000 points in Firefight on Alpha Site.

achievements.name: Firefight: Windward
achievements.description: Score over 200,000 points in Firefight on Windward.

achievements.name: Firefight: Chasm Ten
achievements.description: Score over 200,000 points in Firefight on Chasm Ten.

achievements.name: Firefight: Last Exit
achievements.description: Score over 200,000 points in Firefight on Last Exit.

achievements.name: Vidmaster Challenge: Classic
achievements.description: Finish any level solo on Legendary, on LIVE, with no shots fired or grenades thrown.

achievements.name: Vidmaster Challenge: Endure
achievements.description: In Firefight, on any mission, pass the 4th Set on 4-player Heroic LIVE co-op.

achievements.name: Vidmaster Challenge: Déjà Vu
achievements.description: Complete Highway on 4-player Legendary LIVE co-op, with Iron, and no 'Hog or Scorpion.
